profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer at [Employer's Name], Remote

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer at [Employer's Name]
description: Led the development of multiple high-profile projects, resulting in a 30% increase in team productivity.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and implement scalable architecture solutions.
Mentored junior engineers and provided guidance on best practices and coding standards.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Completed multiple freelance projects, including a high-profile e-commerce platform for a major retailer.
Developed and maintained multiple open-source projects on GitHub, resulting in a significant increase in followers and contributions.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributed to the development of multiple open-source projects, including a popular machine learning library.
Participated in code reviews and provided feedback to other maintainers.
